hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/15149e4e85dfaf85d7d4ff14394ba51e7f486735)

$192=\purpleD{1}\text{ hundred} + \blueE{9}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{2}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD1\text{ hundred} = \blueE{10}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5b5ad9f3dbe81f5f68fd01afdfb965713aa3754b)

$\blueE{10}\text{ tens} + \blueE9\text{ tens} +\maroonD2\text{ ones}= \blueE{19}\text{ tens}+\maroonD2\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{19}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{190}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e92e8f0bfc1f2cff0927e0e597908be105f94c61)

$\maroonD{190}\text{ ones} + \maroonD2\text{ ones} = \maroonD{192}\text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Complete the equations.**

 |  | |  | | | | |
-: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: 
$192 =$|$1$ |$\text{ hundred}$ |$+$| $9$ | $\text{ tens}$ | $+$ | $2$ |$\text{ ones}$
$192=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 1]] | $\text{tens}$ |$+$ | $2$ | $\text{ ones}$
$192=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | $0$| $\text{ tens}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 2]] | $\text{ones}$
